definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome

sentences.english: RESULTS The authenticity identification standard for the Synurus deltoides was ascertained.
sentences.chinese: 確定了山牛蒡真實性鑑定標準。

sentences.english: The extraction and purification technique of inulin from Great Burdock(Arctium lappa L. ) root is studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究從牛蒡根中提取菊糖並進行純化的方法。

sentences.english: Antioxidant Effects of Arctium Lappa L.
sentences.chinese: 牛蒡抗氧化作用的研究。

sentences.english: Progress of Reseach on Arctium lappa L.
Objective To deal with the quality evaluation of Arctium lappa in various place with HPLC method.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立不同產地牛蒡子藥材綜合質量評價方法。

sentences.english: The invention relates to shrimp egg flavor type burdock sauce made from burdock.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及用牛蒡做成的一種蝦子香型牛蒡醬。

sentences.english: The invention relates to shrimp egg flavor type burdock sauce made from burdock.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及用牛蒡做成的一種蝦子香型牛蒡醬。

sentences.english: Results indicated that homogenate extraction was an effective method to extract arctiin from Arctium lappa L.
sentences.chinese: 閃式提取法是一種快速有效的提取牛蒡苷的方法。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish the standard of pharmacognostic identification for the Synurus deltoides.
sentences.chinese: 建立山牛蒡生藥學鑑定標準。

sentences.english: Response surface analysis (RSA) methodology was used for optimizing homogenate extraction processing of arctiin from Arctium lappa L.
sentences.chinese: 採用響應面分析法優化牛蒡苷閃式提取的工藝條件。

sentences.english: Objectve To investigate the mechanism of Arctium lappa soup on the treatment of cervical spondylosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探析牛蒡子湯治療頸椎病的作用機理。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To optimize the extracting processes of chlorogenic acid from Arctium lappa L.
sentences.chinese: 目的對牛蒡葉中綠原酸的提取工藝進行優化。

sentences.english: HPLC method for determination of arctiin in Yinqiao Jiedu tablets was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立HPLC法測定銀翹解毒片中牛蒡子苷的含量。

sentences.english: Some boil Burdock while others saut or deep fry it.
sentences.chinese: 一些煮牛蒡，而其他工人或油炸它。

sentences.english: Enrich with Witch Hazel Extract, Burdock Root Extract, Aloe Vera Leaf Extract.
sentences.chinese: 以金縷梅豐富提煉品，牛蒡根提煉品，蘆薈薇拉葉。

sentences.english: Shave away the skin of burdocks . Cut it into a 4cm length's line.
sentences.chinese: 將牛蒡的皮刨乾淨，然後牛蒡切成4公分長的條狀。

definition: himematsutake mushroom (Agaricus subrufescens or Agaricus blazei Murill)
variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
